= Windows Setup =

_FreeSpeech Windows install is in development. Here is what we have so far, if you want to help._

== Cygwin ==

Install [http://cygwin.com/ Cygwin] Linux emulation layer for Windows and install the dependencies listed in FreeSpeech instructions to install it inside the Cygwin environment.

Install the following packages through setup.exe
    * python
    * python-cairo
    * python-gobject
    * python-gobject-devel
    * python-gtk2.0
    * python-gtk2.0-demo
    * python-gtk2.0-devel
    * gstreamer0.10
    * gstreamer0.10-plugins-base
    * gstreamer0.10-plugins-good (optional)

Install pocketsphinx here http://www.cs.columbia.edu/~ecooper/CS4706/ps-cygwin.html

Continue with FreeSpeech setup.

(Optional) Try building native WindowsBinary
